segments.text: I observe the kitchen setup with the sink on the right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water flows from the faucet into the full basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's spilling over the edge onto the floor below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult woman faces the sink, holding a plate and towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems concentrated on cleaning the dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, a boy stands on a small stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into the open cabinet for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool appears slightly tilted but holds steady.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl nearby extends her arm toward the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window above shows a view of the garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The interior contrasts with the calm exterior view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stack neatly on the counter near the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene captures a typical household moment.
segments.speaker: PAR
